title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
short_plot_summary: Snow White, a beautiful young princess, is forced to flee from her wicked stepmother. She finds refuge with seven dwarfs who help protect her from various dangers, including a poisoned apple.
explanation: A princess, representing Snow White, the main character of the story
A poisoned apple, the gift given by her wicked stepmother to try and kill her
A witch, symbolizing the wicked stepmother who uses magic to harm Snow White
A house, representing the home where Snow White finds refuge and stays with the seven dwarfs
A gem, illustrating the dwarfs' occupation as miners and their connection to Snow White
